name: Sumo (itch) (Bap5)
description:
A two Player game I made. 

Controls: 'A' and 'D' to move Player 1 and 'left' and 'right' arrow keys for Player 2. Tap Repeatedly to build up speed and knock your opponent out of bounds to win.

Can I make it single player? Yes. Will I? Probably not. 

Have Fun!
